verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
A
He is good - He is good
His love endures forever
Give thanks to the Lord
For He is good
x2

verse.name: b1a
verse.lines:
For His unfailing love
And His wonderful deeds
Give thanks
Give thanks to the Lord

verse.name: e1a
verse.lines:
He is good - He is good
His love endures forever
Give thanks for He is good

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
You are good
You are good
Your love endures Forever
Give thanks to the Lord
For You are good
x2

verse.name: b1b
verse.lines:
For Your unfailing love
And Your wonderful Deeds
Give thanks
Give thanks to the Lord

verse.name: e1b
verse.lines:
You are good
You are good
Your love endures Forever
Give thanks to the Lord
